summary: A concert documentary shot during the Glee Live! In Concert! summer 2011 tour, featuring song performances and Glee fans' life stories and how the show influenced them.
cast: Dianna Agron|Chris Colfer|Darren Criss|Kevin McHale|Lea Michele|Cory Monteith|Heather Morris|Amber Riley|Naya Rivera|Mark Salling|Jenna Ushkowitz|Harry Shum Jr.|Chord Overstreet|Ashley Fink|Jon Robert Hall|Riker Lynch|Titus Makin Jr.|Curt Mega|Jaymz Tuaileva|Nick Baga|Justin de Vera|Hannah Douglass|Courtney Platt|Kyle Hill|Alexandra Hulme|Kc Monnie|Brittany Parks|Michael Riccio|Haylee Roderick|Kellen Sarmiento|Janae Meraz|Josey Pickering|Trenton Thompson|Natalie Page|Reed Cook|Jane Lynch|Brittany Segrest|Brent Smithson|Jeanine Marie Conrad|Kristina Frisch|Angela Haney|Damian McGinty|Ryan Murphy|Gwyneth Paltrow
